Polygons of EcoAreas

Source: R/data.R
ply_ecoareas_s05.Rd

BOEM EcoAreas, which represent the intersection of Ecoregions and Planning Areas. Simplified to 5% of original vertices for quickly plotting.

Usage

ply_ecoareas_s05

Format

ply_ecoareas_s05

A spatial features sf data frame with 26 rows and 8 columns:

ecoarea_key

key for Planning Area

ecoarea_name

name for Planning Area

geom

geometry of polygon as sf::st_geometry()

ctr_lon

centroid longitude

ctr_lat

centroid longitude

area_km2

area in square kilometers
